mapper.insert: insert into catagory (name, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOW())
mapper.update: update catagory set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = NOW() where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag from catagory where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and del_flag='0'
select id, name, description, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag from catagory where del_flag='0'
